text: The 1978 Open Tour of Britain was an edition of the Tour of Britain cycle race and was held from 7 August to 12 August 1978. The race started in Greenock and finished at the Crystal Palace circuit. The race was won by Johan van der Velde. ==General classification== {| |Final general classification {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Time |- | style="text-align:center;" | 1 | | style="text-align:right;" | |- | style="text-align:center;" | 2 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 6" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 3 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 6" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 4 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 1' 36" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 5 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 1' 39" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 6 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 1' 47" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 7 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 1' 48" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 8 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 1' 54" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 9 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 12' 08" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 10 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 12' 11" |} |} ==References== 1978 Tour of Britain Tour of Britain
